title: I literally just lost 10 LP because I never was able to connect. THANK RITO for the wonderful client
body:
All I could see was game is still in progress and it wouldn't let me connect even when I restarted the client four times. team mates surrendered and I lost 10 LP. WTF is up with this fucking game. From 99 LP all the way to zero because of trolls and bugs. 
Give my 10 LP back.

I'm also getting weird champ selects where I can't change summs and can't see the countdowns.
